description: Support to Local Government Reform through reforming the legal framework and capacity building

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The final draft of the Project Management Cycle Policies & Procedures manual has been submitted to MoLG. By end of Q3/beginning of Q4 approval should be obtained. Following approval induction workshops are planned.
subproject.title: Support to LG. Reform (CB&Law)

title: Support to Local Govt. Reforms- Legal Framework ,CB
